data.title: WiLD Bunch Mornings
data.meta_description: Wild Bunch Mornings with Budman and Marija, every weekday morning from 6am-10am on Southwest Florida's #1 Hits Music Station, B1039.
data.text:
Marija is a morning show host on WXKB/B1039 and midday host on WRXK/96KRock. She has been in radio since 2005 working at a variety of stations in Chicago, Milwaukee, Fargo and now in Fort Myers. She has worked in formats including Top 40, Active & Classic Rock, News/Talk, Hot AC and Country. Food is one of her favorite things to create content on. She loves checking out new restaurants and attending food festivals. Traveling is another thing she enjoys. Anything that involves an adventure is what she’s always looking for. She loves living in Florida. Therefore, weekends usually consist of spending time at the beach, kayaking or finding fun and hidden gems to explore.

Budman Meet Budman, dynamic host of Marconi Award winning radio station WXKB’s WiLD Bunch Mornings on B1039. Budman likes to write about funny news, a good Florida man story, stupid criminals or anything involving a superhero. Budman, a comic book and pop culture enthusiast, even named his daughter Kara Zor-El, after Supergirl. His only child is his true passion beyond the mic. Being a dad is his favorite role. Budman, a true family man, balances his love for radio with quality time spent with loved ones and his trusty dogs.
